stories.title: The Intruder - Episode 1
stories.storyDescription: After a strange man knocks on the door, Eddie lands in a terrifying alternate reality where he learns an amazing secret about his father.
stories.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Jonathan Rosen is a transplanted New Yorker, who now lives with his family in sunny, South Florida. He's been writing ever since he was a little kid, but it's much more legible now.

stories.prePaywallNotification: The guy at Eddie’s door is not from this world – and he’s deadly. Read more of THE INTRUDER.
stories.postPaywallNotification: Where did Eddie go?! The answer will surprise you. Read the next episode of THE INTRUDER.
